<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Agile Shield Grip](/Feats.aspx?ID=3622) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 82</row>

**Access**
Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.

**Requirements**
You are wielding a shield with a [shield boss](/Weapons.aspx?ID=41) or [shield spikes](/Weapons.aspx?ID=42) in one hand.

</column>

---

You change your grip on the shield, allowing you to combine rapid attacks with your shield boss or shield spikes and your main weapon's Strikes in a series of swift motions. You reduce your shield boss and shield spikes weapon damage die to 1d4. As long as the weapon damage die is 1d4, your shield boss and shield spike Strikes gain the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170) weapon trait. You can use Agile Shield Grip again to switch to a normal grip, returning the damage to the usual amount and removing the agile trait.
